name: Bird Catcher (BirdsGotGame)
description:
You are a budding field assistant. Your goal is to catch birds in the forest, for science.

Succeed, and maybe you will become a fully-fledged field ornithologist, or even get promoted to a professor. But be careful, if you fail your performance review you could get fired.

You will need to outsmart birds and place nets at strategic locations. If you get too close, the birds will be scared away - but perhaps you can use this to your advantage? 

If you catch enough birds for the research project, then your lab can get more funding and will be able to buy better equipment.

This game is in early development, and many features are still being implemented. Please enjoy the game for free, and let me know if it was fun!

Current development is focusing on core gameplay:

  • More maps
  • Equipment upgrades (nets, traps, net gun)
  • More bird types
  • Career mode
  • Graphics & Font update!

Windows release only for now.
